title: Search Head Clustering
short-description: High availability at the Search Head tier

title: Indexer Cluster Monitoring
short-description: The new bucket status page makes it  easier to  monitor large scale clusters. It provides an in-depth view of all cluster related recovery operations

title: Distributed Monitoring Console
short-description: Monitor key usage and performance metrics across the entire Splunk topology

title: Getting Data In
short-description: Enhanced pages and workflows for adding data, including new features like Forwarder Inputs and a new version of Data Preview

title: Advanced Field Extractor
short-description: Improve accuracy and efficiency of field extraction to get more value from your data

title: App Key Value Store
short-description: Highly scalable app data storage and retrieval capabilities for developers.

title: Event Pattern Detection
short-description: Auto-discover patterns and anomalies in your data with a single click

title: Instant Pivot
short-description: Explore data within the Pivot interface without having to construct a data model

title: Home Page redesign
short-description: Choose any dashboard to represent your custom home page

title: Bubble Chart
short-description: Use bubble charts for multi-dimensional numeric analytics

title: Panels
short-description: Build custom dashboards faster, leveraging pre-built dashboard panels packaged within apps

title: Multi-Search and Post-Process
short-description: Configure multiple background searches, with explicit post process references throughout your dashboard

title: Input Multi-token Setter
short-description: Set multiple tokens within form inputs to drive multiple searches, better labeling, and more

title: Panel Title Support
short-description: Organize dashboard content into panels, and set a title to describe the content.

title: Free Form Input Support within Dropdown & Multi-select
short-description: Enable users to enter free form text within dropdown and multi-select inputs

title: Universal Hide-Show Objects
short-description: Dynamically control display for all objects on a dashboard

title: Full Object ID Support
short-description: Assign unique IDs to rows, panels, elements, and form inputs for easier custom js/css handling

title: Dashboard Display Controls
short-description: Dashboard display controls for header, footer, and edit functions for easy iframe embedding.
